fields.Name: File Storage: List Objects
fields.Description: List files and directories in a storage provider path. Active providers: Azure Blob Storage, Google Drive, Dropbox, Box.com, SharePoint Storage. Inactive: AWS S3 Storage, Google Cloud Storage.

fields.Name: File Storage: Get Object Metadata
fields.Description: Retrieve metadata about a file object in a storage provider. Returns size, content type, last modified date, and other properties.

fields.Name: ObjectName
fields.Description: Name/path of the file object. Required if ObjectID not provided.

fields.Name: ObjectID
fields.Description: Provider-specific object ID (Box: file ID, Google Drive: file ID, SharePoint: item ID, Dropbox: id). If provided, bypasses path resolution for faster access. Obtain from search results ObjectID field.

fields.Name: IsDirectory
fields.Description: Boolean indicating if object is a directory

fields.Name: File Storage: Get Object
fields.Description: Download file content from a storage provider. Returns the file content as base64-encoded data.

fields.Name: ObjectName
fields.Description: Name/path of the file object. Required if ObjectID not provided.

fields.Name: ObjectID
fields.Description: Provider-specific object ID (Box: file ID, Google Drive: file ID, SharePoint: item ID, Dropbox: id). If provided, bypasses path resolution for faster access. Obtain from search results ObjectID field.

fields.Name: File Storage: Get Download URL
fields.Description: Generate a pre-authenticated download URL for a file. The URL can be used to download the file without additional authentication.

fields.Name: File Storage: Get Upload URL
fields.Description: Generate a pre-authenticated upload URL for a file. The URL can be used to upload a file without additional authentication.

fields.Name: ObjectName
fields.Description: Name/path of the file object to upload

fields.Name: File Storage: Check Object Exists
fields.Description: Check if a file object exists in a storage provider.

fields.Name: Exists
fields.Description: Boolean indicating if the object exists

fields.Name: File Storage: Check Directory Exists
fields.Description: Check if a directory exists in a storage provider.

fields.Name: Exists
fields.Description: Boolean indicating if the directory exists

fields.Name: File Storage: Copy Object
fields.Description: Copy a file object within a storage provider from one location to another.

fields.Name: Success
fields.Description: Boolean indicating if the copy succeeded

fields.Name: File Storage: Move Object
fields.Description: Move or rename a file object within a storage provider.

fields.Name: Success
fields.Description: Boolean indicating if the move succeeded

fields.Name: File Storage: Delete Object
fields.Description: Delete a file object from a storage provider.

fields.Name: ObjectName
fields.Description: Name/path of the file object to delete

fields.Name: Success
fields.Description: Boolean indicating if the delete succeeded

fields.Name: File Storage: Create Directory
fields.Description: Create a directory in a storage provider.

fields.Name: Success
fields.Description: Boolean indicating if the directory was created

fields.Name: File Storage: Delete Directory
fields.Description: Delete a directory from a storage provider. Optionally delete recursively.

fields.Name: DirectoryPath
fields.Description: Path to the directory to delete

fields.Name: Recursive
fields.Description: Boolean flag for recursive directory deletion

fields.Name: Success
fields.Description: Boolean indicating if the directory was deleted
